interpretation: The "e-mail" card represents communication, connection, and correspondence. It symbolizes the exchange of information, ideas, and emotions through technology. This card may indicate a message or news coming your way, or a need to reach out to someone. It can also suggest the importance of clear and effective communication in relationships and business. This card reminds us to be mindful of our tone and language when communicating, as well as the potential for misinterpretation in digital communication. Associated keywords include inbox, send, receive, reply, spam, and attachment. Trust your intuition and pay attention to the details of your messages when this card appears in a reading.
